title: Have a Never Say Die Attitude | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Have a Never Say Die Attitude | Joel Osteen
description:
Too many people give up when they face setbacks, but if you want to succeed, you have to have a warrior mentality. No matter what comes against you, keep pressing forward. It’s only a matter of time before you see your next victory


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
